document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Pinions </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Disdain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">farther </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">fly </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">feather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">specified </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Ornithology </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">wafts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">sordid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Flesh </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Beyond </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">dull </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">control </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">during </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">electric </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gale </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">Body </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">instructing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">same </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">work </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">off </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">filaments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">immortality </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: With pinions of disdain
